underlying_goal: To fix a shell script that incorrectly set an environment variable (CLAUDE_CODE_TMPDIR) on macOS.
primary_success: Claude correctly identified a Linux-specific path causing an issue on macOS and implemented a robust, defensive fix that checks both the OS type and the existence of the directory.
brief_summary: The user pointed out that a CLAUDE_CODE_TMPDIR setting was incorrectly applied on non-Linux systems. Claude added a guard to the shell script to ensure the setting is only applied on Linux and that the specific tmpfs directory exists. The fix was then committed and pushed.
